discourse_list.title: Messari Governor DAO Profile Update for Uniswap DAO

content.content: gm Uniswap! My name is Joel and I’m a governance analyst at Messari. We’re happy to announce that we recently upgraded our DAO profiles on Governor! Aside from the coverage of proposals (for free users), we now provide rich on-chain and off-chain analytics for Uniswap for Pro & Enterprise users. This includes:  Delegate metrics: voting power breakdown, their voting power growth over time, and recent voting activity   1600×1039 208 KB   DAO community engagement metrics: lifetime voters and average voter participation rate   1600×796 137 KB   Proposal metrics: lifetime author counts, counts of proposals in a given timeframe as well as average proposal pass rate   1600×766 124 KB  Any feedback is welcomed! Hoping the community finds these metrics valuable
content.GPT-summary: Messari has upgraded its DAO profiles on Governor and now provides rich on-chain and off-chain analytics for Uniswap for Pro & Enterprise users. The post invites feedback and hopes that the community finds these metrics valuable.
GPT-discussion-categories: Author of proposal is advertising proposal
